Title: Knowledge Nugget: Green India Mission – what does it tell us about India's fight against land degradation that UPSC aspirants must know
Summary: The Green India Mission is a key initiative in India's fight against land degradation. UPSC aspirants should understand its objectives, implementation strategies, and impact on environmental conservation and sustainable development. This mission is crucial for topics related to Environment & Ecology and Indian Polity & Governance in the UPSC examination.

Title: UPSC CURRENT AFFAIRS – 21 June 2025
Summary: This article covers key current affairs for 21 June 2025, focusing on the World Investment Report 2025. UPSC aspirants should pay attention to the report's findings on global economic trends, foreign direct investment patterns, and their implications for the Indian economy and international relations.

Title: UPSC Weekly Current Affairs Quiz | June 15 to June 21, 2025
Summary: This weekly quiz covers diverse topics from Indian Economy, Polity & Governance, International Relations, Science & Technology, and Environment & Ecology. Title: UPSC CURRENT AFFAIRS – 20 June 2025
Summary: The article focuses on Inclusive Education, a key topic for UPSC aspirants under Social Issues & Justice and Indian Polity & Governance. Candidates should understand the concept, its implementation in India, challenges, and recent policy developments in this area.

Summary: This weekly summary highlights key events and reports, including the State of World Population report. UPSC aspirants should focus on the main findings of global reports and their relevance to India's social, economic, and international policies.

Summary: This daily quiz covers multiple UPSC-relevant topics including Indian Economy, Polity & Governance, International Relations, Science & Technology, and Environment & Ecology. Aspirants should attempt this quiz to test their knowledge and identify areas for further study.
